entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers or periods of drizzle ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:42 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 12:42 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning.
